channel.title: Anyone know?
channel.description:
anyone know how i can make a command like
::demaster to get me to lvl 3
to get xp up is
addSkillXP
does anyone no what it is to remove xp?

item.title: Anyone know?
item.dc:creator: @rockh4rd rockh4rd
item.description:
@rockh4rd wrote:

can you make me command?

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone know?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I believe that would set your XP to that. Try like

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("demaster") && playerRights >= 3) { playerXP(0, 0); playerXP(0, 1); playerXP(0, 2); playerXP(0, 3); playerXP(0, 4); playerXP(0, 5); playerXP(0, 6); playerXP(0, 7); playerXP(0, 8); playerXP(0, 9); playerXP(0, 10); playerXP(0, 11); playerXP(0, 12); playerXP(0, 13); playerXP(0, 14); playerXP(0, 15); playerXP(0, 16); playerXP(0, 17); playerXP(0, 18); playerXP(0, 19); playerXP(0, 20); playerXP(0, 21); playerXP(0, 22); playerXP(0, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. you just lost all your xp :/"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone know?
item.dc:creator: @rockh4rd rockh4rd
item.description:
@rockh4rd wrote:

like this?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("demaster") && playerRights >= 3) { playerXP(14910000, 0); playerXP(14910000, 1); playerXP(14910000, 2); playerXP(14910000, 3); playerXP(14910000, 4); playerXP(14910000, 5); playerXP(14910000, 6); playerXP(14910000, 7); playerXP(14910000, 8); playerXP(14910000, 9); playerXP(14910000, 10); playerXP(14910000, 11); playerXP(14910000, 12); playerXP(14910000, 13); playerXP(14910000, 14); playerXP(14910000, 15); playerXP(14910000, 16); playerXP(14910000, 17); playerXP(14910000, 18); playerXP(14910000, 19); playerXP(14910000, 20); playerXP(14910000, 21); playerXP(14910000, 22); playerXP(14910000, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. you just lost all your xp :/"); }

item.title: Anyone know?
item.dc:creator: @toxiccorn toxiccorn
item.description:
@toxiccorn wrote:

playerXP[the number for the skill] -= amount of xp you want to be gone;

Read full topic
